Healthcare providers can't continue to chase cost reductions. As a change, we are now looking at how we can improve topline revenue and one way to do that is to improve patient access. Come and listen to our speakers discuss one of the hottest healthcare topics of today. Register today!

Hospital-at-home care has seen remarkable growth in recent years, fueled by technological advancements and regulation changes. This innovative approach allows for treating acute-care patients in the comfort of their homes, providing a unique and personalized healthcare experience alongside their loved ones. Becker's Healthcare unveils the top 8 Hospital-at-Home programs that are transforming patient care: Atrium Health, Mass General Brigham, Mayo Clinic, Kaiser Permanente, Mount Sinai Health System, UMass Memorial Medical Center, ChristianaCare, and Saint Luke's Health System. Each program showcases unique strengths from Atrium's plans for 200 daily patients to Mass General Brigham's cost-effective model. Learn how these pioneers are reshaping healthcare delivery: https://bit.ly/3twXA3O #hospitalathome #healthcareinnovation #patientcare #beckershealthcare

Small and rural hospitals were already facing enormous challenges balancing capital and operating needs while dealing with dwindling reimbursement rates. Now with federal programs coming to an end, "it puts the community hospital in a tough situation," said John Gaede of San Juan Regional Medical Center. In this clip from a recent #podcastinterview, he talked about how CIOs can stop the bleeding by increasing efficiency. https://lnkd.in/eyXQsBgP #communityhospitals #ruralhealth #healthcareit #cioleadership
